# Draft:Doug Howarth

----
Doug Howarth is a English Film Editor
Though based in London he is best known for making films for U.S. networks.
References

---

## Draft:DOUG HOWARTH

DOUG HOWARTH is an English Film editor based in London, but working predominantly for US Networks.
